DOC.brief_summary: To purpose study compare pharmacodynamic property insulin detemir , insulin glargine NPH insulin single subcutaneous injection .
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize , double-blind , euglycemic glucose clamp study , 10 healthy male volunteer receive subcutaneous injection 0.4 U/kg insulin detemir , insulin glargine NPH insulin three separate study day cross-over design . After insulin administration , plasma glucose maintain 0.3 mmol/l fast level 24 hour manually adjust glucose infusion . C-peptide , insulin , NEFA counter regulatory hormone measure throughout clamp period . Endogenous glucose release ( EGR ) assess isotope dilution technique ( 3-3H-glucose ) .
DOC.criteria: Male BMI 20 50 kg/m2 Blood pressure < 140/90 mmHg sign informed consent Caucasien Diabetes disease Alcohol drug abuse Smoking Use prescription drug
DOC.keyword: Levemir , Lantus , Insulatard , Pharmacodynamics , Healthy human
